title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI dashboard for chatting, pulling, and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose stacks for dev and prod.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and CLI to interact with Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with LINQ-style chat builders and Blazor demo.

title: ollama-benchmark
summary: Community benchmark suite measuring tokens/sec, latency, and memory across models.

title: ollama-model-mirror
summary: Scripts to create offline mirrors of Ollama model blobs for air-gapped environments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate limits, and OpenAI-style endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that brings Ollama models into channels with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot for chatting with Ollama models, includes moderation and model switching.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app to start/stop Ollama, monitor GPU usage, and quick chat.
